parent_collections.title: Single cell RNA sequencing of retrogradely labeled mouse stellate ganglion neuron

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"993p9","text":"Place a freshly harvested Stellate Ganglion (SG) into an ice-chilled Earle’s Balanced Salt Solution (EBSS) that was equilibrated to 95% CO2/ 5% O2 for 1 hour","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56ncl","text":"Carefully remove fat and connective tissue from the SG, and then transfer the SG to a new dish containing cold equilibrated EBSS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cq5e","text":"Cut the SG into 3-4 pieces using a small spring scissor, and placed all pieces gently into a low-bind 1.7 ml microcentrifuge tube containing 1,667 μl pre-heated (37°C) digestion solution for 1.5 h with constant agitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lvj8","text":"Digestion solution is composed of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"621bg","text":"1034 μl Papain solution  in EBSS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cdlb","text":"200 μl Collagenase/Dispase solution (20 mg/ml in EBSS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"771qg","text":"167 μl D-trehalose solution (50% in RNase-free water)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bn0p","text":"3 μl AP-V solution (25mM in EBSS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cslam","text":"13 μl kynurenic acid solution (100mM in EBSS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7291j","text":"250 μl DNAse (vial D2 in EBSS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1unjd","text":"During the digestion, prepare a digestion-stop solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nd5b","text":"1,050 μl 50% D-trehalose solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1iqvd","text":"11 μl 25 mM AP-V solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c2e3","text":"44 μl of the 100 mM kynurenic acid,","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frh4n","text":"250 μl of the DNAse solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm636","text":"250 μl fetal bovine serum (FBS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47e1s","text":"Prepare medium solution containing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49u6o","text":"1,050 μl 50% trehalose solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv5ep","text":"8 μl the 25 mM AP-V","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkt7r","text":"19ul 100 mM kynurenic acid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bikbg","text":"107 μl FBS in 9,450 μl D-MEM/F12","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9f2c","text":"After the digestion, transfer half of the digestion solution with the tissue to a fresh low-bind microcentrifuge tube, and fill each tube with the digestion-stop solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n3ni","text":"Invert the tubes a few times gently and centrifuge them at 300g at 4C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1et1s","text":"Discard the supernatant and gently resuspend the pellet with 500 μl of the digestion-stop solution described above","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkdbi","text":"We combined the contents into a single tube and triturated the SG carefully with fire-polished glass Pasteur pipettes that were pre-coated with 0.5% BSA in RNase-free water for at least 1h at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uoaf","text":"We progressively decreased the diameter of the pipettes from 300-400 μm to 150 μm during the trituration process","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"das3n","text":"The contents were then divided again into two tubes and washed with 1 ml of the medium solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd1nu","text":"We inverted the tube gently 10 times and centrifuged it at 300 g for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34q3u","text":"The supernatant was discarded and the pellets were gently re-suspended with 200 μl of the medium solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"780am","text":"The suspension was filtered using a 40 μm cell strainer and collected in a 15-ml plastic tube. We used Sytox blue (1:1000) to stain dead cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmhrk","text":"Keep the cell suspensions on ice until sorting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c0dv","text":"Sort single cells into 96-well plates, We used FACSAria sorter with a square cuvette with a 130-μm nozzle at 12 PSI.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oh04","text":"We sorted based on the the signal from Alexa 488, Alexa 555, or the lack of any signal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a1aq","text":"Centrifugate the plates at 200g for 2 min and immediately freeze them on dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Ganglia dissociation and single-cell sorting
